title: Diamond Vanki - Floral Splendor
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. The gold features a subtle matte finish.
features: This elegant Vanki pendant showcases a floral design, with diamond-encrusted flowers joined by delicate gold stems. A fan of pave-set diamonds hangs below the floral design to provide sparkle. The piece exudes a modern adaptation of the traditional South Indian Vanki, blending its symbolic significance with a contemporary aesthetic.
colors: Yellow Gold and shimmering White Diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Its modern design also lends itself well to formal gatherings and festive celebrations.
description: This Vanki pendant is a stunning fusion of tradition and modernity, making it a versatile and timeless piece. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship guarantee lasting brilliance and enduring value. It's a perfect addition to any jewelry collection, representing both cultural heritage and contemporary style.
